title: Haley and Bella's Wedding
text:
We can’t wait to share this day with you! Here is all the information you need to participate in whatever way works best for you.
If there’s info you need that isn’t here, text us!!

title: Haley and Bella's Wedding
text:
Date
Our wedding is on Saturday, September 12th from 3 pm - midnight

title: Haley and Bella's Wedding
text:
Location
We are getting married at the Récreoparc, 5340 Bd Marie-Victorin, Sainte-Catherine, QC J5C 1L9. We are ~ a 20 minute drive from Montréal (see Transportation, below).

title: Haley and Bella's Wedding
text:
Lodgings

Camping
The Récreoparc is a campground! We have reserved several sites on Friday and Saturday nights for anyone who wants to camp. We will be staying there both nights!
If you are using one of the sites we have reserved, you will most likely have to share with some other folks (but don’t worry, everyone on the list is very cool).
If you are travelling far and/or don’t have camping stuff, let us know! We will try to get enough gear for everyone who wants to participate to be able to.
The Récreoparc has showers, a cafeteria, and a café in the welcome pavillion accessible to all campers. We will also plan to have meals available to folks camping on Friday eve, and Saturday morning + lunchtime.
For those interested, the Récreoparc is located on a bike path! If you live/are staying in Montréal and want to arrive by bike, all campsites are equipped with a bike rack.


Other lodging
We see and LOVE all our non-camper guests. We intentionally selected our venue so that it was in very close proximity to all the wonderful hotels available in Montréal.
The Récreoparc is close enough to the city that you will be able to bike, take a cab, drive, or use the shuttle service to get to the wedding if you are staying in the city. Please enjoy all the luxury that Montréal has to offer!

title: Haley and Bella's Wedding
text:
Transportation

Wedding Shuttle
If there is sufficient interest, we will plan to get a shuttle that will be available to transport guests from downtown Montréal to the Récreoparc.
We will have the shuttle leave from a central destination in time for the ceremony and have it return after we eat.


Venue Parking
If you are driving, you are welcome to park at the Récreoparc. We will be closest to P3 and parking can be paid for on site. If you are unable to drive home after the event, you are welcome to leave your car overnight and come get it in the morning.


Getting downtown from the airport
If you are flying in (thank you!!!!), there are a few ways to get downtown from the airport.

The 747 bus that goes directly from the airport to Lionel-Groulx metro station. You can buy a day pass ($11) in the airport and use it to get on the bus and then wherever you need to go from there.
There are of course ubers, lyfts, taxis, and whatsits at the airport ready to take you anywhere you need to go. English will not be a problem!
Getting to Montréal early? Text us, Bella would love to come scoop you from the airport.

title: Haley and Bella's Wedding
text:
Gifts
The greatest gift any of you could give us has already been given! We are so grateful to each of you for your friendship, love, and support. Many of you are travelling very far distances to join us, and all of you are giving us your precious time and energy. For those reasons, we respectfully request no gifts.

title: Haley and Bella's Wedding
text:
Date & Schedule
Our wedding is on Saturday, September 12th from 3 pm - midnight
Our ceremony will take place at 3 pm, followed by games/drinks/photos/fun times. Dinner will be served at 6 pm, to be followed by dancing!
Please note that the ceremony, dinner, and dancing will all take place outdoors. There are bathrooms located close by. The festivities will take place on a grassy lawn with tables and chairs, so wear whatever clothes & footwear feels right for you!

title: We are so excited to share this day with you!
text: We hope you can join us on our wedding adventure that will include bonfires, yummy food, camping, dancing, lots of love, and more! Please check out the Information tab for all the details you need. RSVP using the RSVP tab so we know if you are joining us.
